name: Ça Glisse En Crèche
description:
Team :

Anthony Nadeau Poulin - 3D & Compositing

Jess ... - Animation

Samuel - Modeling

Samuel - Music


Controls :

Spacebar : Switch between Visit mode and Play Mode

Visit mode :

     A & D : To go around the path

     Mouse : To move the focus

Play Mode :
     W : To move forward

     A & D : To steer
